name: Grappin.io Micro Surveys Widget
author: Grappin

sections.description:
This plugin provides a simple installation of Grappin on your WordPress site.

Grappin is a micro-survey service that makes it easy for you to get feedback.

The widget is beautiful by default, and it’s customizable to best match your brand.

Easily measure user satisfaction (CSAT), Net Promoter Score (NPS) or Customer Effort Score (CES) as your users browse your site. You can then from the dashboard see your insights and export your data

To learn more about the service, see grappin.io
sections.installation:
Simple installation

The Grappin plugin can be installed via the WordPress plugin library.

  • Navigate to the “Plugins” section in your WordPress dashboard
  • Click on “Add New” and search for the “Grappin” plugin
  • Install and then activate the plugin

Manual installation

Alternatively, you can also install the Grappin plugin manually:

  1. Download the Grappin plugin as a zip file.
  2. Upload the folder grappin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Configuration

Once installed, go to “Settings > Grappin” and enter your Grappin ID. You can find the ID in your Grappin Dashboard in the “Documentation” section. (Only available in French for now)

You can find a detailed step-by-step guide in our documentation.
sections.faq:
Where can I find more information about Grappin ?

You can learn more about Grappin on our website grappin.io.

Is there a guide somewhere on how to get started with Grappin?

Yes, you can find more information on how to get started in our documentation. (Only available in French for now)
